description: Moves your civilization from urbanism to Kingdom, unlocking powerful technologies and abilities not available in earlier phases of expansion. This is the Athenian kingdom phase, where metal gathering rates are boosted because of the Silver Owls bonus.
requirementsTooltip: Requires 10 City Phase structures to be built.
tooltip: Advance to Empire Phase, which unlocks powerful technologies and abilities. Territory radius for Civic Centers increased by a final +25%. 'Silver Owls' bonus gives +10% metal gathering rates.
